dct_title_s: A map shewing the situation of the principal places mentioned in the history of the Kings of Judah & Israel
dct_description_sm: Bar scale on map given in "English miles".
Shows topography, drainage, places of historical interest.
Decorative cartouche with an illustration of a tree and Israelites.
